content:
The University of Tennessee womens cross country team was unable to accomplish its goal of a top20 national finish but firstyear coach J.J PERIOD Clarks team did state its case for a spot in the FinishLynx Top  and a nod as one of the United States upandcoming distance programs PERIOD

The Lady Vols tallied  points to finish tied for twenty-eighth at the NCAA Cross Country Championships Monday afternoon at the 6000meter LaVern Gibson Cross Country Course PERIOD

Dependable senior Sharon Dickie once again paced the Lady Vols finishing fiftieth in a time of . in her final cross country race as a Lady Vol PERIOD It marked the nineteenth consecutive time the Grand Blanc Mich. native has crossed the line first for Tennessee dating back to Nov PERIOD   PERIOD Incidentally that was the last time the Lady Vols made an NCAA team appearance PERIOD

Felicia Guliford who has scored mainly in the two and three positions for the Lady Vols all season long suffered a hip injury in Tennessees regional victory and spent the early part of the week on crutches with severe pain PERIOD After rehabilitating the injury all week consulting with physicians and running for the first time on Sunday Guliford and Clark made the decision for her to compete PERIOD Guliford finished two hundred and forty-sixth PERIOD

 Clark said PERIOD 

BYU claimed the team title with  points PERIOD Taking the individual crown was North Carolinas Shalane Flanagan in . pERIOD

Mens cross country finished thirty-first

Nine days after posting the highwater mark in Tennessees cross country season with an improbable team victory at the NCAA South Regionals the Volunteer harriers fortunes cooled Monday with a 31stplace finish at the NCAA Championships PERIOD

Tennessee struggled to advance its pack through the best field the nation has to offer on Indiana States 10K LaVern Gibson Championship Cross Country Course resulting in a 647point 31stplace finish PERIOD The Vols finished one point behind 30thplace Michigan State PERIOD

 Watts said PERIOD 

Prerace favorite Stanford took the team title with  points  points ahead of runnerup Wisconsin PERIOD Individually Jorge Torres running for fourthplace Colorado broke the tape first to lead in the 214runner field PERIOD

Patrick Gildea led the Volunteer effort for the fourth race this season with his 100thplace finish in a lifetimebest . pERIOD

Senior cocaptain Eric Bell finished his cross country career one hundred and thirty-seventh in . pERIOD Bell stood as the second Tennessean to cross the finish line his highest position in the Vol pack since  PERIOD

Qualifying for the  NCAA Championships also marked the first time since  that the Vols qualified as a team in the NCAA Championships PERIOD
